title: Cho'gath - the terror of anyone who he lands a Q on
body:
Full AP {{champion:31}}  in my opinion is currently the most reliable and simultaneously dominant mid/top lane force on the rift. I've played a few games as him (it?) and it's just a matter of time until he starts to rack up the kills and feast stacks. He ends up also with 3k+ health by the end if he builds {{item:3027}}. In the early game even if the enemy tries to trade with him he silences aa 1-3 times then follows up with an easy Q due to the fact they are running away. He then can simply get a few last hits (which is easy to do with his E) and let his passive give him health regen. Once he gets level six, he can either start getting feast stacks if the enemy is playing passively or 80%-0 his opponent with an all in. From there it's all downhill for the enemy team as by about 30 minutes (if fed) 1-shotting the enemy carries with his ult is possible.

If you havn't already try out full AP {{champion:31}} in mid and see how stupid he is.
